author: gstein
msg: one little kick from Gohan and the baby Cell was destroyed...

author: trawick
msg: Add apr_getnameinfo(), which uses getnameinfo() when APR_HAVE_IPV6 is
defined.  APR_HAVE_IPV6 will only be defined if getnameinfo() is present.
Still to do: Switch to this in Apache and axe apr_get_hostname().
OS/2 and Win32 logic for reporting getaddrinfo() failures is from existing
code.  The OS/2 code doesn't look right to me (need to add APR_OS_START_xyz?)
I'm not sure what is needed for pre-BONE BeOS.

author: trawick
msg: apr_get_ipaddr(): return IPv4-style strings for IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses

author: dreid
msg: We need to define this correctly or it's never set and we don't set
